dict.acceptation: 吸收（液体、气体等）；吸引（注意）；吞并，合并；忍受，承担（费用）；

sent.orig: Practice tenses as abundance as possible. when you absorb a new verb, absorb its various forms.
sent.trans: 尽估计多地操练时态。研究唯一行业趋势词语的时间，要研究它的各种形态。

sent.orig: Starting absorb time of sternum are 4.54±2.85 days, Obvious absorb time of sternum are 7.74±4.68 days.
sent.trans: 胸片开始吸收时间为4.54±2.85天，明显吸收时间为7.74±4.68天。

sent.orig: Absorb blood, blood clan's passing to absorb blood can enjoy imperfect eternal life.
sent.trans: 吸血，血族通过吸血可享受不完全的永生。

sent.orig: If you don't absorb to consider when you are not youth, you may not happen absorb.
sent.trans: 假如你年轻时么有搞会思考，那就永远学不会思考。

sent.trans: 尽估计多的练时态。研究一个动态词语的时间，要研究它的各种形态。
